articles.description: In ‘Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai’, Akshara learns about Aarohi’s decision of postponing the engagement. She gets restless.
articles.content: Star Plus show Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai is getting the love of the viewers. The current track of the show revolves around Abhimanyu expressing his feelings to Aarohi and asking her to take the deci… [+1359 chars]
